targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("power90"))   /3600 * 1.0  FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter and time <= now()  GROUP BY time(1d)
select max(p) from (SELECT last("P_daily") as p FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter ) GROUP BY time(1d)

select last(fm)-last(f0) from (SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("power")) /3600 * 1.0 as fm FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d)), (SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("power")) /3600 * 1.0 as f0 FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter and  time <= now()  GROUP BY time(1d) )
select max(p) from (SELECT last("P_peak") as p FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter ) GROUP BY time(1d)
SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("power90")) * 1.0  /3600   FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("P_daily") FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("power"))   /3600 * 1.0  FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("power10"))   /3600 * 1.0  FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
select integral(prod) /300 from (SELECT mean("P_active")  as prod FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(linear)) GROUP BY time(1m)   fill(previous)
SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("M_P")) /3600 / 1000  FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time(1m)  fill(linear)
SELECT (integral("power"))   /1800  FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT (integral("power90"))   /1800  FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT (integral("power10"))   /1800  FROM "forcast" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)

SELECT last("M_PTot") - first("M_PTot") as "from grid",  last("M_PExp") - first("M_PExp") as "export",  first("M_PTot") - last("M_PTot") + last("M_PExp") - first("M_PExp") as "balance" FROM "Huawei" WHERE  $timeFilter  fill(previous) order by time asc
select cumulative_sum(diff)  as "∑ balance" from (SELECT first("P_Exp") - first("P_Grid") + first("Adj") as diff FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() -365d  GROUP BY time(1d) fill(0))
SELECT mean("P_active") * 1000 FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("M_P") - mean("P_active") * 1000 FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("P_active") FROM "Huawei" WHERE time > now() - 1h and P_active > 0 GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT last("M_P") / 1000 FROM "Huawei" WHERE time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT last("M_P") / 1000 - last("P_active")  FROM "Huawei" WHERE time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT last("P_active") FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter and time > now() - 2h   GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT (last("M_P")  /1000  - last("P_active")) as p FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter and time > now() - 2h  GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT last("M_P")  / 1000 FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter and time > now() - 2h GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT cumulative_sum(integral("M_P")) / 3600 / 1000 FROM "Huawei" WHERE time > now() - 1h  GROUP BY time(1m) fill(linear)
SELECT "Fault"  FROM "Huawei_stat" where 'Status' != null order by time desc limit 1
SELECT "State1"  FROM "Huawei_stat" where 'Status' != null order by time desc limit 1
SELECT "State2"  FROM "Huawei_stat" where 'Status' != null order by time desc limit 1
SELECT  "State3"  FROM "Huawei_stat" where 'Status' != null order by time desc limit 1
SELECT  "Status"  FROM "Huawei_stat" where 'Status' != null order by time desc limit 1
SELECT last("Insulation")  FROM "Huawei_info" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT max("Temp") FROM "Huawei" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(previous)
select mean(q) from (SELECT (mean("U_A-B") -  mean("M_U_AB"))  / mean("I_A")  as q FROM "Huawei" WHERE ("I_A" > 15) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null))
SELECT first("radiance") FROM "solar" WHERE time > now() - 31d  group by time(1d) fill(previous)
SELECT ("P_daily") FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() - 31d
SELECT  ("P_Exp") as export FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() - 31d
SELECT ("P_Load") FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() - 31d
SELECT ("P_peak") FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() - 31d
SELECT ("P_Grid") FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() - 31d
SELECT ("f_power") FROM "Huawei_daily" WHERE time > now() - 31d
SELECT mean("P_daily") FROM "Huawei_daily" group by time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("P_Exp") as export FROM "Huawei_daily" group by time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("P_Load") FROM "Huawei_daily" group by time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("P_peak") FROM "Huawei_daily" group by time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("P_Grid") FROM "Huawei_daily" group by time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("f_power") FROM "Huawei_daily"  GROUP BY time(30d) fill(none)
SELECT mean("f_power90") FROM "Huawei_daily"  GROUP BY time(30d) fill(none)
